pushUps.title: Push-Up Mastery
pushUps.description: Build upper body strength with progressive push-up variations that target your chest, shoulders, and triceps.

basicPushUp.title: Basic Push-Up
basicPushUp.description: Master the fundamental push-up movement with proper form and technique.

video.title: Perfect Push-Up Form
video.description: Learn the correct technique for standard push-ups

inclinePushUp.title: Incline Push-Up
inclinePushUp.description: Beginner-friendly variation using an elevated surface to reduce difficulty.

video.title: Incline Push-Up Tutorial
video.description: How to perform push-ups on an incline for beginners

diamondPushUp.title: Diamond Push-Up
diamondPushUp.description: Advanced variation targeting triceps with hand placement forming a diamond shape.

video.title: Diamond Push-Up Technique
video.description: Advanced push-up variation for tricep strength

squats.title: Squat Power
squats.description: Strengthen your legs and glutes with comprehensive squat training for lower body power.

bodyweightSquat.title: Bodyweight Squat
bodyweightSquat.description: Foundation squat movement focusing on proper form and depth.

video.title: Perfect Squat Form
video.description: Master the basic squat movement pattern

gobletSquat.title: Goblet Squat
gobletSquat.description: Add resistance with a weight held at chest level for increased difficulty.

video.title: Goblet Squat Tutorial
video.description: How to perform goblet squats with proper form

jumpSquat.title: Jump Squat
jumpSquat.description: Explosive plyometric variation to develop power and athleticism.

video.title: Jump Squat Technique
video.description: Explosive squat jumps for power development

bodyweightCircuit.title: Bodyweight Circuit
bodyweightCircuit.description: High-intensity circuit training using only your body weight for a complete workout.

burpees.title: Burpees
burpees.description: Full-body explosive movement combining squat, plank, and jump.

mountainClimbers.title: Mountain Climbers
mountainClimbers.description: High-intensity cardio exercise in plank position with alternating leg drives.

plankJacks.title: Plank Jacks
plankJacks.description: Core-focused exercise combining plank hold with jumping jack leg movement.

video.title: Plank Jack Tutorial
video.description: How to perform plank jacks with good form

pullUps.title: Pull-Up Progression
pullUps.description: Develop upper body pulling strength with progressive pull-up training and variations.

assistedPullUp.title: Assisted Pull-Up
assistedPullUp.description: Use assistance to learn proper pull-up form and build strength progressively.

video.title: Assisted Pull-Up Methods
video.description: Different ways to assist your pull-up training

negativesPullUp.title: Negative Pull-Ups
negativesPullUp.description: Focus on the lowering phase to build strength for full pull-ups.

video.description: How to use negatives to build pull-up strength

chinUps.title: Chin-Ups
chinUps.description: Underhand grip variation that emphasizes bicep involvement.

video.description: Proper chin-up technique and differences from pull-ups
